mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "TN_TRAIN_MGMT" WHERE "TR_MGMT_STATE" = 1
SELECT * FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMGRP" AS grp INNER JOIN "TN_TRAIN_EXAM" AS exam ON grp."TR_EXAM_GRPID" = exam."TR_EXAM_GRPID" WHERE grp."TR_EXAM_GRPNAME" = #{grpName} ORDER BY exam."TR_EXAM_NUM"
SELECT * FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMHINT" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} AND "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id}
SELECT "TEAM_CD" FROM "TN_USER" WHERE "TR_USER_ID" = #{id}
SELECT "STAT_ID" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" WHERE "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd}

SELECT "STAT_ID" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} AND "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id}
SELECT * FROM "TN_USER" WHERE "TR_USER_ID" = #{tr_user_id}
SELECT "TR_EXAM_ANS", "TR_EXAM_POINT" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAM" WHERE "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
SELECT * FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMGRP" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
SELECT * FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMHINT" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} AND "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id}
SELECT * FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMGRP" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
SELECT "TR_EXAM_ANS", "TR_EXAM_POINT" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAM" WHERE "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id}

SELECT "CNT_TRY_ANS" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} AND "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id}
SELECT "START_TIME" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
SELECT "START_TIME" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}

SELECT count("STAT_ID") FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "RESULT_SCORE" > 0 AND "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}

SELECT count("CNT_TRY_ANS") as explanationCount, (SELECT "TR_EXAM_COUNT" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMGRP" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}) as maxExplanationCount, (SELECT sum("RESULT_SCORE") FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} and "RESULT_SCORE" >= 0) as resultScore, (SELECT sum("WRONG_SCORE") FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}) as wrongScore, (SELECT count("STAT_ID")*10 FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} and "HINT_USE"=1) as hintScore FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} and ("CNT_TRY_ANS" = 2 OR "RESULT_SCORE" > 0)

SELECT count("CNT_TRY_ANS") as explanationCount, (SELECT "TR_EXAM_COUNT" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMGRP" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}) as maxExplanationCount,
(SELECT sum("RESULT_SCORE") FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} and "RESULT_SCORE" >= 0) as resultScore,
(SELECT sum("WRONG_SCORE") FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}) as wrongScore,
(SELECT count("STAT_ID")*10 FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} and "HINT_USE"=1) as hintScore
FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} and "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} and "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} and ("CNT_TRY_ANS" = 1 OR "RESULT_SCORE" > 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" SET "CNT_CORRECT_ANS" = "CNT_CORRECT_ANS"+1 WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
UPDATE "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" SET "CNT_FALSE_ANS" = "CNT_FALSE_ANS"+1 WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
mapper.select: SELECT "RESULT_SCORE" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} AND "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" SET "RESULT_SUM" = ( SELECT sum("RESULT_SCORE") FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMRESULT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}) WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}

UPDATE "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" SET "SUBMIT_ANSWER" = 1, "END_TIME" = NOW() WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
mapper.select: SELECT "SUBMIT_ANSWER" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT_TEAM" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
SELECT "MA_TACTICS_ID" FROM "TC_MITERATTACK_TACTICS"
SELECT "TR_EXAM_GRP", "TR_NUM" FROM "TN_TRAIN_MGMT" WHERE "TR_MGMT_STATE" = 1
SELECT "TR_EXAM_GRPID" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMGRP" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPNAME" = #{tr_exam_grpname}
SELECT "TR_EXAM_ID", "MA_TACTICS_ID", "MA_MATRIX_ID" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAM" WHERE "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
mapper.update: UPDATE "TN_TRAIN_MATRIXSTAT" SET "CORRECT_ANSWER" = 1 WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TEAM_CD" = #{team_cd} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid} AND "TR_EXAM_ID" = #{tr_exam_id}
mapper.select: SELECT "END_TIME" FROM "TN_TRAIN_EXAMSTAT" WHERE "TR_USER_GRP" = #{tr_user_grp} AND "TR_USER_ID" = #{tr_user_id} AND "TR_NUM" = #{tr_num} AND "TR_EXAM_GRPID" = #{tr_exam_grpid}
